alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 7:57AM CDT until July 24 at 8:15AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 AM CDT FOR JACKSON COUNTY... At 757 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Independence, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Kansas City, Independence, Lee`s Summit, Blue Springs, Leawood, Raytown, Grandview, Prairie Village, Grain Valley, Greenwood, North Kansas City, Mission Hills, Sugar Creek, Lake Lotawana, Westwood, Courtney, Lake Tapawingo, Westwood Hills, Mission Woods and River Bend. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Missouri between mile markers 1 and 23. Interstate 35 in Missouri between mile markers 0 and 4. Interstate 35 in Kansas near mile marker 235. Interstate 470 between mile markers 0 and 16. Interstate 435 between mile markers 56 and 75. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
